class.name: ResultTemplateEntity
class.comment: Storage of templates for the result handling operations

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: The offering that is associated with the result template

column.name: fk_phenomenon_id
column.comment: The phenomenon that is associated with the result template

column.name: fk_procedure_id
column.comment: The procedure that is associated with the result template. Can be null if the feature is defined in the structure.

column.name: fk_feature_id
column.comment: The feature that is associated with the result template. Can be null if the feature is defined in the structure.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the result template used for insertion operation

column.name: structure
column.comment: The structure of the result template, should be a XML encoded swe:DataRecord

column.name: encoding
column.comment: The encding of the result template, should be a XML encoded swe:TextEncoding
